resources.string:
Enable the translate button and approve the various permission requests.


You can toggle which buttons are shown, enable diagnostics reporting, and more in the Settings menu.


Android 5.0+ supports taking screenshots directly from an app. On Android 4.4 you will need to manually take a screenshot before translation.


Monster info translation takes only a few seconds on a modern phone. Dungeon names take longer and require an internet connection, that OCR is provided by the Google Vision API.


If your phone does not work properly, enable Send Diagnostics. The next time you attempt to translate, you will be prompted to email diagnostic results.
Utilities to improve your experience on the PAD JP server.
